name: tls-checker
description: Client-side TLS 1.1 and TLS 1.2 checker by doing a remote request.

scripts.minify: uglifyjs -o tls-checker.min.js --compress --mangle --preamble='/*! TLSChecker v0.1.0 | (c) 2015 Ionata Digital. | ISC license */' -- tls-checker.js

author: Evo Stamatov <evo@ionata.com.au>
